db:abstract.db:para: The QStyleOptionHeader class is used to describe the parameters for drawing a header.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QStyleOptionHeader contains all the information that QStyle functions need to draw the item views' header pane, header sort arrow, and header label.

For performance reasons, the access to the member variables is direct (i.e., using the . or -> operator). This low-level feel makes the structures straightforward to use and emphasizes that these are simply parameters used by the style functions.
For an example demonstrating how style options can be used, see the Styles example.

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionHeader::SectionPosition
db:section.db:para: This enum lets you know where the section's position is in relation to the other sections.

db:td.db:para: At the beginining of the header
In the middle of the header
At the end of the header

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionHeader::SelectedPosition
db:section.db:para: This enum lets you know where the section's position is in relation to the selected section.

db:td.db:para: Not adjacent to the selected section
Both the next and previous section are selected

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionHeader::SortIndicator
db:section.db:para: Indicates which direction the sort indicator should be drawn

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionHeader::StyleOptionType
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to hold information about the type of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.

db:td.db:para: The type of style option provided (SO_Header for this class).

db:section.db:para: The type is used internally by QStyleOption, its subclasses, and qstyleoption_cast() to determine the type of style option. In general you do not need to worry about this unless you want to create your own QStyleOption subclass and your own styles.

db:section.db:title: enum QStyleOptionHeader::StyleOptionVersion
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to hold information about the version of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.
The version is used by QStyleOption subclasses to implement extensions without breaking compatibility. If you use qstyleoption_cast(), you normally do not need to check it.

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionHeader::QStyleOptionHeader()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QStyleOptionHeader, initializing the members variables to their default values.

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionHeader::QStyleOptionHeader(const QStyleOptionHeader &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of the other style option.

db:section.db:title: QIcon QStyleOptionHeader::icon
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the icon of the header
The default value is an empty icon, i.e. an icon with neither a pixmap nor a filename.

db:section.db:title: Qt::Alignment QStyleOptionHeader::iconAlignment
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the alignment flags for the icon of the header
The default value is Qt::AlignLeft.

db:section.db:title: Qt::Orientation QStyleOptionHeader::orientation
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the header's orientation (horizontal or vertical)
The default orientation is Qt::Horizontal

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionHeader::SectionPosition QStyleOptionHeader::position
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the section's position in relation to the other sections
The default value is QStyleOptionHeader::Beginning.

db:section.db:title: int QStyleOptionHeader::section
db:section.db:para: This variable holds which section of the header is being painted
The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionHeader::SelectedPosition QStyleOptionHeader::selectedPosition
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the section's position in relation to the selected section
The default value is QStyleOptionHeader::NotAdjacent

db:section.db:title: QStyleOptionHeader::SortIndicator QStyleOptionHeader::sortIndicator
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the direction the sort indicator should be drawn
The default value is QStyleOptionHeader::None.

db:section.db:title: QString QStyleOptionHeader::text
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the text of the header
The default value is an empty string.

db:section.db:title: Qt::Alignment QStyleOptionHeader::textAlignment
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the alignment flags for the text of the header
The default value is Qt::AlignLeft.
